channel.title: PI pack yak help

item.title: PI pack yak help
item.dc:creator: @collin123456 collin123456
item.description:
@collin123456 wrote:

i currently have:

//pack yak if(itemId == 12435 && c.lastsummon == 6874) {; if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.sDelay >= 600000) { for(int z = 0; z < 101; z++) { for(int t = 0; t < 28; t++) { c.getItems().bankItem(z, t, 2147000000); c.sendMessage("Your pack-yak banks your items!"); c.gfx0(1311); c.startAnimation(7660); c.sDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); } } } else { c.sendMessage("Enough time hasn't passed since you last used this!"); } }
but it then lags like crazy and banks your items in inventory, not the yak, does anybody have an idea of how i can fix this?

Read full topic
